ygData.subject: Vendor selling necro spells in wkarana
ygData.msgSnippet: I was speakign to a lvl 50 necro on my server anad apparently it is possible to buy harmshield on a female barbarian near qhills, by the water or somewhere
ygData.messageBody:
I was speakign to a lvl 50 necro on my server anad apparently it is
possible to buy harmshield on a female barbarian near qhills, by the water
or somewhere aroudn there in wkarana. I was wondering if anyone could
confirm/try this. Maybe she also has soem other spells, hopefully the lvl
24 pet one, which seems to have dissappeared everywhere. I though sk's got
the lvl 24 pet spell in which case it must be buyable somewhere, if anyone
knows please could you tell me. Thanks in advance, malados
